quest.name: Way of the Gladiator
journal: Lulutsu wishes you to reaffirm your desire to join the Gladiators' Guild.
Lulutsu has bid you speak with First Sword Mylla, whose approval you must obtain if you wish to join the guild.
The guildmaster has instructed you to slay marmots, hornets, and shrews outside the gates of Ul'dah. Venture forth and do battle with the beasts.
You have slain the creatures as instructed and become more familiar with your weapon. Return to the Gladiators' Guild and speak with Mylla.

Mylla states that to master the sword, you must remember and reflect upon your experiences in battle. Taking her words to heart, you resolve to seek out and test yourself against new foes.

※The next gladiator quest will be available from Mylla upon reaching level 5.

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: What will it be? Will you rise above the masses and inscribe your name in legend, or will you resign yourself to mediocrity and die in obscurity?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Join the Gladiators' Guild?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: Oh, so it's to be death in obscurity... Well, should you come to your senses, you may speak with me at any time to proceed with the enrollment process.

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: A decision you shan't regret. One moment─make way for Forename Surname! Fresh meat coming through!

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: Now then, before your enrollment can be considered complete, you must present yourself to First Sword Mylla. Seek her out and obtain her approval.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Aye, I heard Lulutsu. So you're Forename Surname. 'Tis a good, strong name.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: On behalf of the Gladiators' Guild, allow me to welcome you. I am Mylla, guildmaster here.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: So you wish to study our arts. I presume you have your reasons for choosing the sword over all other weapons. Perhaps you think it easiest to learn.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: A sword is a simple weapon. But to wield a blade well is anything but simple.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: For every Coliseum champion to emerge from our ranks, there have been countless disappointments who failed to achieve greatness.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Bear that in mind before you answer me, Forename, for I do not ask this question lightly: have you the strength to live by the sword and─if it be your fate─die by it?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: Have you the strength to live by the sword?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Then perhaps your path lies elsewhere. Should it lead you back to us someday, we can discuss your future once more.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Then welcome, gladiator, to your new home!

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Let's not waste time, shall we? I would gauge your aptitude for the sword.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Just outside the gates of Ul'dah, you'll find plenty of marmots, hornets, and shrews. Slay three of each and return here when finished.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: A simple task, but essential to your training nonetheless. Now, go.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Welcome back, Forename. I take it you've dispatched the beasts, and with ease.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Rest assured there will be far greater challenges to come. If you wish to master the sword, you must test yourself against a wide variety of foes. To this end, I present to you this hunting log.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: It contains information on creatures ideal for a gladiator-in-training. You will doubtless gain valuable experience should you seek out and slay them. It is only with such practice that you will recognize and eliminate the deficiencies in your technique.

dialogue.name: MYLLA
dialogue.text: Your training under me shall continue once the haft sits so snugly in your hand that you cannot imagine holding aught else. Until then, Forename.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The next gladiator quest will be available from Mylla upon reaching level 5.
